eto stay where you are all the same. Because unplugging you would
be directly killing an innocent violinist, and that’s murder, and that’s imper-
missible.” If anything in the world is true, it is that you do not commit mur-
der, you do not do what is impermissible, if you reach around to your back
and unplug yourself from that violinist to save your life.
The main focus of attention in writings on abortion has been on what a
third party may or may not do in answer to a request from a woman for
